The EU & its Member States will work hard to achieve the global vaccination target of 70% in 2022.
 
We will support capacity building for sequencing, testing, treatments and vaccination.
 
We aim to share at least 700 million doses by mid-2022 with low & middle-income countries. https://t.co/mDgnA3fbxS

Let's be better prepared against future pandemics.

I welcome the start of negotiations for a global agreement on prevention, preparedness and response.

I also support a new financial intermediary fund for global health security.
